creator: jwkaltz@apache.org
text:
I believe the build-solaris.sh for the Apache 1.3 connector should have -DEAPI 
as a compile flag, otherwise the module won't be loaded properly by Apache - at 
least, not by the Apache/OpenSSL and this should be the most common 
configuration for sites requiring security.

Furthermore, the text in build-solaris is no longer up to date with the way in 
which the mod-jk.conf is generated in Tomcat 3.3 (it changed since rc 1)

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text: This is now fixed, and will appear in 3.3.1-B1.
*** Bug 5993 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
